summary: Finanzas Module Testing Complete - All features working correctly on both desktop and mobile. Backend APIs (22 tests) and Frontend UI verified.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ FinanzasModule.jsx properly imports and uses all required icons from lucide-react
✅ API_URL is correctly set to empty string for relative URLs
✅ useFinanzas hook properly handles authentication with Bearer token
✅ All tabs (Resumen, Ingresos, Gastos, Inversiones, Por Cobrar, Por Pagar) are implemented
✅ StatusBadge component correctly displays colored badges for different statuses
✅ HealthIndicator shows correct status (good/warning/critical) with appropriate colors
✅ Modal forms (IncomeModal, ExpenseModal, InvestmentModal) have proper validation
✅ DockSidebar.jsx includes Finanzas item with DollarSign icon and onOpenFinanzas handler
✅ MobileNavigation.jsx includes Finanzas item with DollarSign icon and onOpenFinanzas handler
✅ MindMapApp.jsx properly integrates FinanzasModule with handleOpenFinanzas and renderMainContent case 'finanzas'
seed_data_creation: User has existing test data: 1 income (S/5,000 - Cobrado) and 1 expense (S/1,500 - Pagado)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Finanzas module fully tested. Backend endpoints: /api/finanzas/summary, /api/finanzas/incomes, /api/finanzas/expenses, /api/finanzas/investments, /api/finanzas/categories, /api/finanzas/income-sources, /api/finanzas/receivables, /api/finanzas/payables. All CRUD operations work. Frontend: Finanzas button visible in both desktop sidebar (DockSidebar) and mobile navigation (MobileNavigation). Dashboard shows summary cards, tabs work, modals open correctly.

backend_api: ✅ GET /api/finanzas/summary - Returns financial summary with health_status
frontend_desktop: ✅ Finanzas button appears in DockSidebar with DollarSign icon
✅ Summary cards display: Ingresos, Gastos, Inversiones, Resultado neto
✅ Secondary cards: Por Cobrar, Por Pagar, Caja Estimada
✅ Tabs work: Resumen, Ingresos, Gastos, Inversiones, Por Cobrar, Por Pagar
✅ Ingresos tab shows table with data and 'Nuevo Ingreso' button
✅ Gastos tab shows table with data and 'Nuevo Gasto' button
✅ 'Nuevo Ingreso' modal opens with form fields
✅ Status badges show correct colors (Cobrado=green, Por cobrar=yellow, Pagado=green, Por pagar=red)
frontend_mobile: ✅ Finanzas button appears in MobileNavigation drawer with DollarSign icon
✅ Clicking Finanzas in mobile menu navigates to Finanzas module
✅ Finanzas module displays correctly on mobile viewport
✅ Summary cards stack vertically on mobile
✅ Tabs are scrollable horizontally on mobile
